audio_roast_collection.title: Roast Fillers
audio_roast_collection.description: The sequence of general-purpose roasts and sound effects that play before the main analysis.

options.content: Ladies and gentlemen, a wild username appears.
So, you typed in your username. Brave move.
Oh, look who showed up, another hero with a GitHub account.
Do you even know what's inside your own repos? Yeah, we do.
Hope you didn't expect us to clap for your profile picture.
Don't worry, your profile full of half-baked repos is safe, for now.
Buckle up. It's not just commits getting pushed around today.
You ready? No, you're not. Nobody ever is.
This roast will be faster than your internet and harsher than your code reviews.
Get ready, because even your forks are going to feel this burn.
Sit tight, this is about to hurt more than a merge conflict.
You might want to keep a bucket of ice nearby.
